overview: There's only one cure for the beautiful female patients of Naked Heart Hospital... a good dose of Penis-illin from Doctor DJ! When handsome young & hung doctor, DJ sees that the lack of sexual healing amongst the hospital's staff is affecting their work, he realizes that he must come up with a plan to heal everyone of their Acute Bone-itis...
tagline: Don't Miss Out On The XXX Parody Of The Year!
title: Scrubs: A XXX Parody
